content.raw: It might be worth noting that `_type` will never get used in any of these functions. I left it out on purpose to express the fact that the argument only exists for the sake of creating a unique function overload signature. These `_type` objects are always completely empty and will never be used as actual objects. The only purpose behind these function arguments is to guide the compiler to pick the desired implementation of each function.
